urls.title: Flood Resilience and Response
urls.description: Flooding is an important issue and climate change is likely to increase the risk of flooding in the future. The council works closely with the Environment Agency and other partners e.g. United Utilities, in order to minimise the risk to people and property.

@EnvAgency's @JamesBevanEA says that while he is 'all for' reforming and reviewing environmental regulations, this should be done in a modern and proportionate way. He says that in the UK's economic recovery, some 'red tape' will be necessary to protect the environment.

Emma said key to green recovery and decarbonising UK economy is @EnvAgency's regulation, including nuclear, hydrogen and carbon capture and storage. We have now begun to operate the new UK Emissions Trading Scheme...
